title: National Assembly General Elections (Mandevu Constituency No. 80, Kasenengwa Constituency No. 41, Lusaka Central Constituency No. 79, Chawama Constituency No. 76, Mafinga Constituency No. 89 and Mpulungu Constituency No. 105) (Election Date and Time of Poll) Order, 2021
content:
Supplement to the Republic o f Zambia Government 621
Gazette dated Friday, 16th July, 2021
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
Statutory Instrument No. 67 of 2021
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(ActNo. 35 of 2016)
The Electoral Process (General) Regulations, 2016
The National Assembly General Elections (Mandevu
Constituency No. 80, Kasenengwa Constituency No. 41,
Lusaka Central Constituency No. 79, Chawama
Constituency No. 76, Mafinga Constituency No. 89 and
Mpulungu Constituency No. 105) (Election Date and Time
of Poll) Order, 2021
Whereas in pursuance of Article 52(6) of the Constitution, the Cap. 1
Electoral Commission of Zambia has been informed of vacancies
in respect of Mandevu Constituency No. 80 by reason of the death
of the aspiring candidate Mrs Melody Musutu, Kasenengwa
Constituency No. 41 by reason of death of the aspiring candidate
Mr Titus Kasinje Miti, Chawama Constituency No. 76 by reason
of resignation of the aspiring candidate Mr Ntazana Mutungwa
Musukuma, Lusaka Central Constituency No. 79 by reason of
resignation of the aspiring candidate Ms Charity Lumpa, Mafinga
Constituency No. 89 by reason of resignation of the aspiring
candidate Mr Binwell Kalikani Muwowo and Mpulungu
Constituency No. 105 by reason of the resignation of the aspiring
candidate Mr Gilbert Bwali Musonda.
Now therefore, in exercise of the powers contained in Article
52(1), Article 52(6) of the Constitution of Zambia, section 28 of Cap. 1
the Electoral Process Act No. 35, 2016 and Regulation 15(1) of
the Electoral (General) Regulations, 2016, the following Order is
made:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Assembly General Title
Elections (Mandevu Constituency No. 80, Kasenengwa
Constituency No. 41, Lusaka Central Constituency No. 79,
Chawama Constituency No. 76, Mafinga Constituency No. 89 and
Mpulungu Constituency No. 105) (Election Date and Time of Poll)
Order, 2021.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box30136,10101. Lusaka, Price K4.00 each
622 Statutory Instruments 16th July, 2021
Date and 2. A candidate for election as a Member of Parliament for
time of Mandevu Constituency No. 80, Kasenengwa Constituency No. 41,
nomination
forelection Lusaka Central Constituency No. 79, Chawama Constituency No.
76, Mafinga Constituency No. 89 and Mpulungu Constituency No.
105 shall be lodged with the returning officer on Monday, 12th July,
2021, between 0900 hours and 1500 hours.
Campaign 3. The campaign period shall commence on Monday, 12th July,
period 2021 at 1500 hours and close at 1800 hours on Wednesday, 11th
August, 2021.
Election date 4. (1) The polls for the election of a Member of Parliament
and time of in the Constituencies referred to in Paragraph 2 shall take place on
poll
Thursday, 12th August, 2021, between 0600 hours and 1800 hours.
(2) A poll shall not be taken in a Constituency if only one
candidate is validly nominated.
Made by the Electoral Commission of Zambia at Lusaka this
12th day of July, 2021.
Justice E. E. Chulu,
Chairperson
A. D. Simwinga,
Member
N. M. Munn,
Lusaka Member
16th Julyy, 2021
